actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on the Budget, H. Rept. 95-582.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #525 (199-188).
Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.
Measure passed Senate, amended, roll call #361 (63-21), inserted provisions of S. Con. Res. 43.
Conference report filed in House, H. Rept. 95-601.
Conference report filed in Senate, S. Rept. 95-428.
Motion to recede and concur in Senate amendment with an amendment passed House, roll call #545 (215-187).
Senate agreed to House amendment, roll call #375 (68-21).

official_title: A concurrent resolution revising the congressional budget for the U.S. Government for the fiscal year l978.

summary.text: (Conference report filed in House, H. Rept. 95-601) Sets forth the congressional budget for the United States Government for the fiscal year 1978. States that the recommended level of Federal revenues is $397,000,000,000 and the amount by which the aggregate level of Federal revenues should be decreased is $1,100,000,000. States that the appropriate level of total new budget authority is $500,100,000,000. Establishes the appropriate level of the public debt at $775,450,000,000. Sets forth the appropriate level of new budget authority and the estimated budget outlays for each major functional category.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution revising the congressional budget for the U.S. Government for the fiscal year l978.
